title: Project-Based Mathematics Design Education for African Graduate Students

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematics and engineering design concepts
context.additional_context: Course emphasizing cultivation of students' self-directed design abilities through project-based learning in a smartphone-centric environment. Strengthening peer collaboration using social support structures

learning_goals: Learners can complete over 80% of design projects for solving real-world math problems
Learners can improve the design process through peer feedback in three or more stages
Over 60% of learners voluntarily participate in extended mathematics-related activities after completing the course.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
